nodes.text: The Ralltiiri Light Freighter was a class of light freighter active during the First Order/Resistance War. At least one Ralltiiri Light Freighter participated in the Battle of Exegol against the Sith Eternal forces as part of the citizens' fleet.

The Ralltiiri Light Freighter appeared in the 2019 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The vehicle was first identified in the 2020 video "Every Ship in the Star Wars Sequel Trilogy" which was released as part of the Star Wars By the Numbers series on the StarWarsKids.com YouTube channel.
